title: Gab & Juls: Are Bayern Munich in Crisis?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens are joined by Jan Aage Fjortoft to discuss Bayern Munich's third consecutive draw in the Bundesliga and ask whether their current form constitutes as a crisis for the German giants. The guys also discuss Juventus' dramatic 2-2 draw with Salernitana, which which included one of the biggest VAR gaffes to date, the Premier League postponement, how Real Madrid have stayed perfect and Marco Rose's great debut as Leipzig manager.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Bayern Munich drop points in Bundesliga for 3rd-stright game; Juventus' VAR robbery; Real Madrid continue perfect run
